verbs.description: [V: is] crucifixion [ARG2: necessary] [ARG1: for us to enter the kingdom] is crucifixion necessary for us to enter the kingdom in preparation for an upcoming debate about the doctrine of penal substitutionary atonement my adversary asked me if it was necessary for jesus to die before we could enter the kingdom of god this is a great question first of all let establish what the gospel is and then we can answer that question the gospel matt john luke sickness jesus matthew law of christ gospel mark paul
